short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refreshes the page until it finds a button with a specified text, then clicks the button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I've created this extension to book a place in a highly popular gym class, then decided to make it public.

The functionality is very simple: it keeps reloading a current page until it finds a button or a link with a specified text, for example "Reserve a place". Then it clicks the link and stops refreshing.

Source code is available on github: https://github.com/veton/chrome.click-first
